courses: Intro to Algorithms & Models of Computation

projects.name: Personal Webapp
projects.description: As seen above, this website is my personal webapp that I built using NextJS full-stack with ReactJS as the front end in combination with TailwindCSS utility classes. This website also feature api endpoints to allow for freqently changing information to be updated on the backend.

projects.name: Tetris on FPGA
projects.description: Implemented tetris on a MAX10 FPGA using SystemVerilog. I personally handled the storing of information related to the game, in particular, onto SDRAM which require special consideration in order for the SDRAM controller to function properly

projects.name: Ultrasonic Robotics Car
projects.description: Designed and built a robust ultrasonic robotics car that used an ultrasonic sensor to detect and move away from an obstacle
